vehicles.description: A white sedan is directly in front of our vehicle, situated in the same lane and traveling in the same direction.
vehicles.explanation: The presence and behavior of that vehicle directly affect the speed and following distance that our vehicle should maintain.

barriers.description: Green barriers are located on both sides of the road, which may reduce the drivable area.
barriers.explanation: Obstacles guide the flow of traffic and restrict shoulder passage, which helps to maintain lane discipline.

other objects.description: There are debris on the road near the right-side barricade.
other objects.explanation: Fragments may pose a hazard; the vehicle must be prepared to avoid them while not performing any unsafe maneuvers.

general_perception.description and explanation: The traffic image shows a white sedan directly in front of our vehicle, traveling in the same lane and direction. The presence and behavior of this vehicle will directly influence our vehicle's speed and following distance. Additionally, there are green barriers on both sides of the road, which may reduce the drivable area. These barriers guide the flow of traffic and restrict shoulder passage, helping to maintain lane discipline. Furthermore, there are debris on the road near the right-side barricade. These fragments may pose a hazard, and our vehicle must be prepared to avoid them while not performing any unsafe maneuvers.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe following distance from the car in front and adjust your speed as necessary. Be aware of whether the car brakes suddenly. Continue to observe road conditions to guard against any unexpected changes or obstacles. Stay alert and be prepared to respond to changes in vehicle behavior or traffic light status, being ready to stop when the light changes. Keep monitoring the road for changes caused by debris or other factors, ensuring you safely navigate around obstacles without leaving your lane.

1.description and explanation: A traffic signal mounted vertically on a pole, displaying different colors to regulate vehicle flow. Depending on its current color, it instructs drivers when to stop, prepare to move, or proceed through an intersection. This will directly influence the ego car's driving behavior by indicating when it should stop or proceed.

2.description and explanation: This is a discarded item left on the roadside, which can vary in size, content, and origins. It does not have a direct influence on traffic rules, but the ego car must be able to recognize and categorize such objects to ensure safe navigation around potential road hazards without causing a disruption in the traffic flow.
